name: Oceanborn: Survival on Raft
description:
Try to survive in the ocean.

You found yourself all alone on the middle of the ocean without civilization! Only cold salt water, raft and shark! You have to gather resources from the water and craft necessary items. Also, to survive you need food and fresh water. And do not forget about the shark! The game has an advanced crafting system and will be interesting to people who love craft, build and survival games!

Features:

- Gather resources from the ocean

- Craft Items

- Build floor, pillars, stairs and more.

- Grow vegetables and palm trees

- Cook food and make clean water

- Fishing

Attention: We are not affiliated with the developers of the original Raft game.
